scripts.build: yarn prep:goerli && graph codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prep:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs bulla-network/bulla-contracts-mainnet
